author: @MorePara8
text:
Taeil is amazing, he's the best vocalist in NCT, his technique is incredible and his vocal tone so rich.
Kun is great, he has a beautiful voice, so gentle and soft, as he seems to be. Plus his ear is very well trained.
Jaehyun has my favourite voice out of all NCT, his beautiful baritonal tone has my heart. He's not praised enough for his skills tho.
Haechan is a fan favourite for a reason, unique voice and really good technique, his singing is himself.
Chenle is born to sing and he began so early that he has more experience than people older than him. Really great control on his voice.
Love this unit!!

author: @chocosunflowermarker
text:
Dear NCT, 

Merry Christmas 💚🌲
I wish all of you a very happy holidays and I wish you make beautiful memories with your loved ones. I want to thank every member for this year, you guys worked so hard this year and I can't thankyou guys enough. You saved my year and you saved me. I love you guys so much an I will continue to support you in whatever situation ever, I will always stand by your side. 
Thankyou so much for everything, NCT is the best, legends and I want you guys to rock everything you do in life. I wish you guys hapiness, health, wealth and safety for the upcoming year. Please rest well and take care of yourselves. Again, I can't thank you guys enough, thankyou thankyou thankyou. NCTzens love you so much and we will stand by your side forever and ever. 
Have a safe, happy and joyful Christmas and year ending! I love you 💚
Merry Christmas to NCT and NCTzens💚
